text: This is a list of rivers of Puducherry. None of these river originates in Puducherry. ==Puducherry Region== * Gingee River * Guduvaiyar River * Malattar River * Pambaiyar River * Pennaiyar River ==Karaikal Region== * Arasalar River * Nandalar River * Nattar River * Noolar River * Puravadayanar River * Thirumalairajanar River * Vanjiar River ==Mahe Region== * Mah√© River * Ponniyar River ==Yanam Region== * Goutami River * Puducherry
title: List of rivers of Puducherry
